Wildfire:



Wildfire tossed her head at the foolishness of this new bot. If he 
kept his noise up, the wolf would return to her. She threw a blanket 
of pitch darkness into the mind ambient of Thrash, trying to blind 
him.

~Quiet!~ she called out to him without using her voice.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Waspinator9063@a... wrote:
> Thrust was near a forest. He picked up readings on his Radar of a 
few figures 
> on the other side of the forest. "Biker mode." He goes into robot 
mode. "Time 
> to do a little shrubbing." He fires trees, bushes, and small furry 
woodland 
> creatures out of the way. "Hehe..."
